coreAttributes.clothingAuthorTag: A tag discreetly sewn into the cloak's inner lining informs you that it was made by 'C4MG1RL'.
coreAttributes.name: Trickster's Cloak
coreAttributes.description: Whether trying to stand out and draw a crowd or hide your identity after executing a devious plan, this weather-proof cloak will suit your needs. Angled for easy access to a sword, and carrying powerful enchantments, the wearer is sure to always look and perform at their best!
